# Module: tf.profiler



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/profiler/profiler.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/profiler/profiler.py).

profiler python module provides APIs to profile TensorFlow models.
